name: @avada/app
description: An AVADA application for Shopify written in Nodejs

scripts.emulators: npx kill-port 8085 && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=serviceAccount.development.json NODE_ENV=development firebase emulators:start --only hosting,functions
scripts.predeploy: yarn workspace @avada/assets run production && yarn workspace @avada/functions run production
scripts.eslint-fix: npm --prefix packages/assets/ run eslint-fix && npm --prefix packages/functions/ run eslint-fix
scripts.start-dev-embed: concurrently "yarn workspace @avada/functions run watch" "npm --prefix packages/scripttag/ run watch"
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @avada/assets run watch" "yarn workspace @avada/functions run watch"
scripts.git:theme-app-ext:config: git config --global http.version HTTP/1.1 && git config http.postBuffer 524288000
